DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Childrens Rainbow Striped Athletic Socks - Style 1
DescriptionData.Description:
Fun colorful rainbow tube socks are made of super soft Ring Spun cotton making these socks much softer than regular cotton socks. Great for babies, toddlers and kids to wear.
10" socks come thigh-high on babies, mid-knee on toddlers and knee on small kids. 10" socks are recommended for children 5 and under. 14" socks are recommended for kids between the ages of 5 and 10.
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex. Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 10" socks are recommended for children 5 and under. 14" socks are recommended for kids between the ages of 5 and 10
Perfect for use as leg warmers as well as athletic socks
White tube socks with rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex Made in the USA
